org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.options

Class DhcpOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.options.BaseDhcpOption
      • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.options.DhcpOption
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressListOption, AddressOption, ByteOption, ClientFQDN, ClientIdentifier, ClientNetworkInterface, DirectoryAgent, DomainSearch, IntOption, NetwareOptions, ParameterRequestList, PathMtuPlateauTable, PxeReservedOption, RelayAgentInformation, ServiceScope, ShortOption, StaticRoute, StringOption, UnrecognizedOption, UserClass, UUIDClientIdentifier, VendorSpecificInformation

    public abstract class DhcpOption
extends BaseDhcpOption
    The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) provides a framework for passing configuration information to hosts on a TCP/IP network. Configuration parameters and other control information are carried in tagged data items that are stored in the 'options' field of the DHCP message. The data items themselves are also called "options." https://www.iana.org/assignments/bootp-dhcp-parameters/bootp-dhcp-parameters.xhtml
